description:
A silver-haired beauty who was the Commander-in-Chief of the Kan Imperial forces who was also known as the "Great General". She appeared in Shunran`s memory as the host of the banquet at which she instigated the incident between Karin and Sui`s father Batou, whose accidental death caused Sui to mistake Karin as his killer. She appears again in episode 12 in a war meeting with several commanders, discussing about putting down recent uprisings in the country.
She returns in the third season where she is cursed to be turn into a cat and is accompanied by Kada to find a way to lift the curse at Touka Village.
name: Kashin Suikou
